body: FOMO is something I think we all deal with on some level if you're playing the market. Hindsight will always be 20/20 though... I didn't know AMC was opening back up, I haven't been on top of their news in a few weeks. Sounds solid to me! At the very least we know they aren't going to BK anytime soon, you have plenty of backing in this community and more to keep their stock in the forefront for a while.
Don't eat BK it's terrible. I may have been paralyzed from a BK chicken sandwich near Davis, CA.
